p2f.f90

00004 
00005 program p2f
00006     use eqdsk
00007     use gc_terms
00008     use interp
00009     use gc_integrate 
00010     use read_particle_list
00011     use rzvv_grid
00012     use init_mpi
00013     use constants
00014     !use plot
00015     use write_f_rzvv
00016     use read_namelist
00017  
00018     implicit none
00019     
00020     integer(kind=LONG) :: i,j,k
00021     real :: T1, T2
00022     integer :: mpi_count
00023     integer :: nP_wall_total, nP_bad_total, 
00024         nP_off_vGrid_total, nP_badWeight_total
00025     real :: tmpDensity !< Test description
00026 
00027     call init_namelist () !< Read in namelist variables from p2f.nml
00028     call set_constants ()
00029     call read_geqdsk ( eqdsk_fileName, plot = .false. )
00030     call bCurvature ()
00031     call bGradient ()
00032     call init_interp ()
00033     call start_mpi ()
00034     call read_pl ()    
00035     call init_rzvv_grid ()
00036 
00037     call cpu_time (T1)
00038 
00039     do i=mpi_start_,mpi_end_
00040  
00041         !call gc_orbit ( 2.04280, -0.115082, 218696.93, -8985448.2 )
00042 
00043         if ( mod ( i, 100 ) == 0 .and. mpi_pId == 0 ) &
00044             write(*,*) nP, mpi_nP, i, p_R(i), p_z(i), p_vPerp(i), p_vPar(i)
00045 
00046         if ( p_weight(i) > 0 ) &
00047             call gc_orbit ( p_R(i), p_z(i), p_vPerp(i),&
00048                 p_vPar(i), p_weight(i) , plot = plotOrbit )
00049 
00050     end do
00051 
00052     mpi_count   = R_nBins * z_nBins * vPerp_nBins * vPar_nBins
00053 
00054     if ( mpi_pId == 0 ) then
00055         call mpi_reduce ( MPI_IN_PLACE, f_rzvv, mpi_count, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, &
00056             0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, mpi_iErr )
00057     else
00058         call mpi_reduce ( f_rzvv, 0, mpi_count, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, &
00059             0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, mpi_iErr )
00060     end if
00061 
00062     call mpi_reduce ( nP_wall, nP_wall_total, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_SUM, &
00063         0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, mpi_iErr )
00064     call mpi_reduce ( nP_bad, nP_bad_total, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_SUM, &
00065         0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, mpi_iErr )
00066     call mpi_reduce ( nP_off_vGrid, nP_off_vGrid_total, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_SUM, &
00067         0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, mpi_iErr )
00068     call mpi_reduce ( nP_badWeight, nP_badWeight_total, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_SUM, &
00069         0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, mpi_iErr )
00070 
00071     ! Test the reduction operation
00072 
00073     call stop_mpi () 
00074    
00075     call cpu_time (T2)
00076  
00077     if ( mpi_pId == 0 ) then
00078 
00079 
00080         write (*,*) 'Time taken: ', T2-T1 
00081         write (*,'(a,f4.2,a)') 'Wall:      ', real ( nP_wall_total ) / real ( nP ) * 100.0, '%'
00082         write (*,'(a,f4.2,a)') 'Bad:       ', real ( nP_bad_total ) / real ( nP ) * 100.0, '%'
00083         write (*,'(a,f4.2,a,a)') 'off_vGrid: ', real ( nP_off_vGrid_total ) / real ( nP ) * 100.0, '%', 
00084             '   *** only applicable for gParticle = .false.'
00085         write (*,'(a,f4.2,a)') 'badWeight: ', real ( nP_badWeight_total ) / real ( nP ) * 100.0, '%'
00086         write (*,'(a,f5.1,a)') 'Suggested eNorm: ', &
00087             real ( maxVal ( vPerp_binCenters )**2 * 0.5 * mi / e_ / 1e3 ), ' keV'
00088 
00089         !   Integrate over velocity space to get a number for
00090         !   density for sanity check ;-)
00091 
00092         density = 0
00093         do i = 1, R_nBins
00094             do j = 1, z_nBins
00095     
00096                 tmpDensity  = 0
00097                 do k = 1, vPerp_nBins
00098 
00099                     tmpDensity = tmpDensity + &
00100                         sum ( f_rzvv(i,j,k,:) ) * vPerp_binCenters(k)
00101 
00102                 end do
00103                 
00104                 density(i,j)    = tmpDensity * &
00105                     2.0 * pi * vPerp_binSize * vPar_binSize
00106 
00107             end do
00108         end do
00109 
00110         write(*,'(a,e8.2)') 'max ( density ): ', maxVal ( density )
00111 
00112         call write_f ()
00113 
00114     end if
00115 
00116 end program p2f
